item.title: The Uptown - Gorgeous & Spacious 1BR Condo
item.address: 35 Balmuto Street, Toronto, ON, Canada, M2M5B5
item.description: Address: 35 Balmuto Street, Toronto, ON, Canada, M2M5B5 Make this gorgeous and spacious 1 bedroom condo your new home and be just steps to all the high-end fabulous shopping, restaurants and entertainment at Yonge & Bloor and Yorkville! Steps from the subway (both Yonge & Bloor lines). With a walkscore of 100, the world is your oyster! <br /><br />The unit is very well kept and features a great kitchen with stainless steel appliances, granite countertops and lots of cabinet space, an open concept living/dining area with enough space for a dining table and living area, hardwood flooring, carpet in the bedroom, and a south-facing balcony.<br /><br />This upscale building offers many gorgeous amenities including a full fitness facility, aerobics/yoga room, party room with kitchen and terraced garden patio, billiards room, multimedia theatre lounge, virtual golf, boardroom, and 24h concierge.<br /><br />Available immediately.

item.title: Large 1Bedroom @ Bathurst & Lakeshore
item.address: Toronto, ON, Canada, M5V 1B7
item.description: Address: Toronto, ON, Canada, M5V 1B7 Fantastic 1 bedroom unit at Bathurst and Lakeshore, spanning 650 sf and featuring designer finishes, granite countertops, dark bamboo floors throughout, floor to ceiling windows, and a beautiful garden view form the balcony.<br /><br />Located just steps from the waterfront, the CNE, and the Entertainment district, this location is ideal! You'll be on the Lakeshore and Gardiner in minutes, and are walking distance to some of the best bars, restaurants, cafes and shopping in the city. TTC is at your door. <br /><br />The building amenities are superb, including an indoor swimming pool and whirlpool, full gym, rooftop patio with BBQs, party room, pool tables, 24hr concierge, and more. <br /><br />All utilities are included except for hydro. Also available furnished at an extra cost (minimum 1 year lease).<br /><br />Available August 1st.

item.title: SPACIOUS STYLISH BRAND NEW Furnished 2 Bedroom
item.address: Toronto, ON, Canada, M4L3K3
item.description: Address: Toronto, ON, Canada, M4L3K3 $1750 unfurnished <br />$2150 furnished <br /> <br />A must see! Completely renovated, LEGAL, spacious 900 sqft 2-bedroom suite in a home on a gorgeous street in Upper Beach. Everything is brand new and top of the line with loads of style and character. IN-FLOOR RADIANT HEAT throughout!! Large front hall closet, spacious living room, sizable dining room and a designer kitchen (cupboard space galore, 4 stainless steel appliances, quartz countertops and breakfast bar). Generous, beautiful bathroom with double vanity and heated floors. Both bedrooms have queen size beds and large closets. Landlord willing to purchase more furniture (bedside tables, desk, additional dressor) to suit tenants needs. <br /> <br />BONUS! Large 9'x12' brand new patio with a gorgeous view of the tree-lined street. <br /> <br />TTC: Steps to Gerrard street car, minutes to Downtown/Beach express bus, 10 min walk to subway. <br /> <br />Landlord pays for heat/hot water and water/garbage. You pay for electricity (you have a seperate metre and breaker box). Ample street parking with city issued permit for < $200/yr. <br /> <br />ABSOLUTELY NO PETS AND NO SMOKING!! (this is an allergy issue not a preference) <br /> <br />p.s. It is sort of a basement suite, but it is mostly only half below grade and has 8 foot high ceilings. There is so much light from 7 large windows that it does not feel like a basement!

item.description: Address: Halifax Regional Municipality, NS, Canada, B3H 1B9 <p>Ogilvie boasts a picturesque and quiet location in the south end of Halifax, just steps away from beautiful Point Pleasant Park.</p><p>It is close to SMU, DAL and Hospitals, located near Metro Transit route and within walking distance of downtown Halifax, where you will find theatres, dining and shopping. Beautifully landscaped surroundings add to the charm of the clean, quiet and secure building with on-site Resident Managers. </p><p>Heat and hot water are included with laundry facilities conveniently located on each floor. Renovated, carpet free units are also available.</p><p> </p><p>The rents include: heat & hot water. Parking available!</p><p> </p><p>**** We are offering 1 MONTH FREE MOVING BONUS!!!  </p><p> </p><p>NO SECURITY DEPOSIT required for seniors, 55 years old and older.<br /></p>15% DISCOUNT for SENIORS 55 years and older.15% DISCOUNT for DND, RCMP and Halifax Police Employees.15% for Capital Health<p>To arrange a viewing please call 902-830-1861, or for more information or to apply online please visit our website at universalproperties.ca.</p>

item.title: Near Dundas St. Shops, Restaurants, and Transit; Near Churchill
item.address: 250 St. George Street, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5R 3L8
item.description: Address: 250 St. George Street, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5R 3L8 <p align="center">250 St. George<br/><p align="center">250 St. George St., Toronto<br/><p align="center">1-647-496-5946<br/><p align="center">Price: $1400<br/><p align="center">Available: June 01, 2015 <br/><br/>For more photos and information, copy/paste the link below to our website<br/>http://www.hollyburn.com/rental-apartments/250-st-george </p><br/><br/><p>SUITE FEATURES:</p> 1 bedroom Bright and spacious layout Hardwood, laminate, or carpet floors White quartz, granite, or laminate countertops Stove and fridge appliances (some also with dishwasher) Mirror or wood closet doors Updated kitchen and bathroom (some also fully renovated with contemporary style fixtures) Balcony<p>BUILDING FEATURES:</p> Roomy and bright apartments with balconies Breathtaking city views Hardwood floors and vertical blinds 24-hour laundry facility Gated underground parking Professional on-site Resident Manager A short walk from the TTC subway Shopping and restaurants close by Heat hot water and electricity included 1 year lease No pets Unfurnished<br/><br/>Building Description<br/><br/><p>With its triangular balconies and beautiful architecture, 250 St. George’s bachelor apartments for rent and one bedroom rental apartments are ideally situated within walking distance of The Annex and Toronto University. Shops, restaurants and other amenities are virtually at your doorstep, as is the charm and character of a neighbourhood like no other in Toronto. Interiors feature gorgeous views, hardwood floors, a 24-hour laundry, garbage chute and underground gated parking. There’s a bike storage room and an on-site professional Resident Manager. Life at these Toronto apartments for rent offers a winning combination of convenience, style and proximity to everything you need.</p><p>Hollyburn residents enjoy exclusive savings and benefits from our value-added partners, including Costco, AspenClean, Frogbox, and Autoshare.</p><br/><br/>Please call: 1-647-496-5946 for more information. <br/>Images in this ad may or may not be exact representation of the vacant suite. <br/>Professionally Managed by Hollyburn Properties Limited.

item.title: : 1991 Brunswick Street, 1BR
item.address: Halifax Regional Municipality, NS, Canada, B3J 3L8
item.description: Address: Halifax Regional Municipality, NS, Canada, B3J 3L8 Apartment for Rent in Halifax<br/><br/>Key Property Details<br/>At the Heart of the Harbour District!Heated Indoor Swimming Pool, Sauna, & Fitness Centre!Restaurants, Markets, & Shopping Close by!<br/>Property Features<br/>BalconyCable ReadyElevatorFitness CenterFridge / StoveLaundry RoomOn Site ManagementParkingPoolSaunaSecurity CamerasSecurity PatrolsStorageWasher / Dryer<br/>Detailed Property Information<br/>From the heart of the city’s most sought-after district, everything downtown Halifax has to offer is within easy walking distance of Halifax Apartments —a cluster of three quality rental apartments at the heart of the Harbour district. <br> <br> Sizes range from one-bedroom to three-bedroom suites. Fully furnished suites are available at The Plaza. <br> <br> Halifax Apartments offers appealing amenities like an indoor swimming pool, hot tub and sauna, a fully equipped fitness centre, mini mart, gourmet gift shop, business centre and a pizzeria, as well as direct indoor access to the pedway. <br> <br> Natural light streams in through the glass enclosure around the indoor pool. Get in a workout, or just splash around to relax and re-energize. To take your relaxation one step further, try the sauna or the whirlpool. <br> <br> The fitness centre has everything you need to stay in shape—weights, treadmills, elliptical machines, stationary bikes and more. Lockers and showers are available. <br> <br> Spend the afternoon in your favourite lawn chair on the deck, or catch the sunset over the Harbour. <br><br>The Halifax Harbour area is the cultural centre of this lively city, and Halifax Apartments is at its heart, making it easy for you to take full advantage of this ideal location. Restaurants to suit all tastes and budgets, museums, historic sites, markets and shopping—even a casino—are all within a few minutes’ walk. The sun and salt air, the fresh breezes, the boardwalk, the nearby beaches: the sights and sounds of this vibrant district will fill your senses. <br/><br/><br/>Additional Property Information<br/>PoolWhirlpoolSaunaFitness centreRooftop deck and patioUnderground parkingSecurity system and regular building patrols are a reassuring presenceStaff are on call 24 hours a day to respond to residents’ needsAmple storage areasIn-suite laundryPropane fireplacesPrivate balconiesHardwood and vinyl tile flooring

item.description: Address: 210 Maxwell Place, Winnipeg, MB, Canada, R2K 0C7 !!!!!!!!!!!PET FRIENDLY!!!!!!!!! (Only exclusion are dogs) <br /> <br />* If this ad is still up, the apartment is still available* <br /> <br /> <br />Come take a look at this FANTASTIC 2 bedroom suite located just off of McLeod, which has been newly renovated! The suite includes a brand new fridge, stove, and a built-in dishwasher with stainless steel interior. The kitchen features a large amount of cupboard space, as well as a built-in island with plenty of room for whatever your heart desires. The suite also has air-conditioning, as well as gorgeous recessed lighting, and new fixtures throughout. There is a centralized media cupboard, where Shaw or MTS can be hooked up in the blink of an eye. There is smart-card laundry on every floor, and a place to reload the card right in the building. Parking spaces are available upon request for an extra fee, though plenty of street parking is available at no charge. The suite is pet-friendly (unfortunatly no dogs), and the care-takers for the building are absolutely fantastic! The only reason we are moving is to be closer to my work, as I work near Ikea. Please come take a look! The apartment will be available July 1st. It may be earlier depending on whether we can get into our new place earlier. Snap this apartment up before someone else does! The neighbourhood is great- Sobey's is just across the parking lot! 7-11, Starbucks, Tim's, and a host of other great restaurants are all around the corner!

item.description: Address: 2485 Hill-Tout Street, Abbotsford, BC, Canada, V2T 4G5 1 Bedroom 1 Bathroom apartment for July 1. My spouse and I are moving away due to a job offering and would like to get our lease covered. Since this is short notice we are willing to let you keep the damage deposit. The apartment building is pet friendly, however there are no pitbull terriers allowed in the building. It is a very nice apartment, bedroom is very large, in building laundry, has a storage room in the apartment, and a dishwasher. Due to the short notice, it's first come first serve, you will have to pass a credit check through Mainstreet or be able to bring proof of income. We will have more information upon contact. Feel free to call me anytime, however tomorrow (Friday) I am at work so if you leave me a voicemail or preferably text or email I will get back to you ASAP. Apartment has the exact same layout as on the photo's however it is not the exact same, the flooring in this apartment is a lighter shade and the bathroom counter is slightly different but other than that the layout is identical. <br />Rent is $710 per month, rent has gone up in this building which you will not be affected by due to taking over our lease, and the rent price includes one parking spot, I believe additional parking is about $10 extra per month.

item.description: Address: 24 Hemlock Crescent SW, Calgary, AB, Canada, T3C 2Z1 Lovely, bright and open, renovated 1 bedroom/1 bathroom condo for rent. Located just off Bow Trail in Copperwood Estates which is on the Shaganappi Golf Course and walking distance to the Westbrook LRT station and to the bike trails. If you'd rather drive, the commute to the core is approximately 10 mins! <br /> <br />This beautiful 750 square foot condo is located on the 5th floor in a concrete building. It is safe and secure. The layout of the unit is well-designed with little wasted space and it was renovated in 2014. Renovations included new paint, flooring, light fixtures and updated gas fireplace facade. The unit also has a modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances (fridge, dishwasher, oven, microwave), corian countertops and glass backsplash tile. There is an oversized, 4-piece cheater bathroom (accessed via the foyer and the bedroom), a bedroom which fits a queen bed and 2 closets, 9' celiings with remote control ceiling fans in the bedroom and living room. The unit comes complete with in-suite laundry, balcony with gas line, assigned undergound parking stall and storage locker. <br /> <br />Tons of amenities including, full gym, party room, meeting room, car wash bay, wood shop and secured bicycle room. Guest suite available. Rent includes water. Electricity extra (runs approx. $35/month). Non-smoking, no pets. <br /> <br />Negotiable availability for a 12 month term.

item.title: LUXURY – Gorgeous 34th Floor Penthouse With Stunning Views
item.address: 210 15 Avenue SE, Calgary, AB, Canada, T2G 0B5
item.description: Address: 210 15 Avenue SE, Calgary, AB, Canada, T2G 0B5 This Prestigious 34th floor Penthouse is the ideal home for the person or couple who deserves it all. Who wants to be, do and have the Extra in Extra Ordinary. Who believes that you only live once and who wants to make it the absolute best it can be. Who wants to create an experience that very few have the opportunity to do - to live in a PENTHOUSE! <br /> <br />The OUTSTANDING RIVER, MOUNTAIN AND CITY VIEWS from every room and window in this Penthouse are spectacular... You Decide How You Start And End The Day. <br /> <br />Admire the majestic Rocky Mountains to the south west, the calming Elbow River to the south, the world famous Stampede Park to the east and the ever changing downtown skyline which serves as your background to the north. Stunning sunrises and sunsets from this executive perch are simply divine. An added benefit is the bird’s eye view you have of the celebrated Calgary Stampede annual fireworks display in July. <br /> <br />This two-storey, 2100 sq. ft., south west corner PENTHOUSE is the best positioned condo in one of Calgary’s urban residential towers called Vetro, located in the heart of downtown Calgary. <br /> <br />The modern design and open floor plan of this exclusive air-conditioned suite provides a level of comfort, luxury living and entertainment space that is rarely available in any rental suite. <br /> <br />Porcelain tile and mirrored closet doors set off the front entry foyer which then flows into the uniquely designed open kitchen. Granite countertops, an extended breakfast bar, dark chocolate full height flat panel kitchen cabinets, premium fixtures and designer backsplash unite to produce a modern open kitchen ideal for cooking the most extravagant of meals, having a beautifully catered event or simply entertaining family and friends. <br /> <br />The Stainless Steel appliance package includes a 23 cubic foot side-by-side refrigerator to easily accommodate the most discerning of ‘foodies’, with water and ice maker for your convenience. item.description: Address: 145 Stewart Street, Ottawa, ON, Canada, K1N 6J8 <p>145 Stewart St. - Move in for June 1st!</p><p>If you're a student of The University of Ottawa who wants to be in the thick of things in downtown Ottawa, there is no better location that 145 Stewart Street Situated in the heart of downtown Ottawa, this apartment building is just steps away from The University of Ottawa, the Rideau Centre and the Byward Market Experience the excitement and convenience of living downtown and have amazing access to all the major shopping centers and transportation hubs, just minutes from your doorstep.</p><p>Building Amenities</p>Balcony Options Overlooking Downtown OttawaClean and Spacious On-Site Laundry FacilitiesHighly Secure and Personally Controlled Building AccessHeat and Hot Water Included in the Price of Your RentSpacious and Secure Surface Parking Available to All Tenants<p>Neighborhood Amenities</p>Central downtown location gives you easy access to all the shops, restaurants, museums, galleries, music venues and office buildings in Ottawa's core.A short walk from The University of Ottawa buildings, gym, swimming pool and medical center.At the center of many essential amenities, including a barbershop and hairdresser, local eateries and coffee shops, book stores, convenience stores, dry cleaners, grocery stores and retail shops.Next to Timothy's coffee shop, steps from the student book stores and Loblaws grocery store.Walking distance to the Rideau Centre, Rideau Canal, Parliament Buildings and Byward Market<p>Transportation Amenities</p>Minutes from the Transitway, with access to most major routes, including #85, #86, #95, #96 and #97.Walking distance to four VRTUCAR rental stationsEasy access to King Edward Ave, Nicholas St. and Highway 417.<p>Call or text Charles at 613-223-7593 | rentals@districtrealty.com and book your viewing!</p>

You must be thinking that is a typo but no if you buy now save up to CAD 40,000 and who doesn't want that. item.description: Address: 433 Edison Avenue, Winnipeg, MB, Canada, R2G 0M3 Hey guys, <br /> <br />I have a 2 bedroom apartment that I've been at since September 2013 but looking to downsize to a 1 bedroom because a 2 bedroom just isn't needed for me anymore. <br /> <br />The suite is normally over $1000, but due to the former property management not handling things properly and there being some damage, we were given the option of moving down a floor onto the second floor to a brand new renovated suite which had things done correctly. item.title: Beautiful Two Bedroom Apartment with In Suite Laundry!
item.address: edmonton, AB, Canada, T5W 1E2
item.description: Address: edmonton, AB, Canada, T5W 1E2 Thank you for clicking on this rental ad. It was likely the affordable price or appealing pictures that caught your eye. <br /> <br />Yes, we are offering this newly renovated apartment featuring in suite laundry, energized parking and private entrances for only $1095 per month including heat and water. Why such a good deal you may ask? Well to answer your question our objective is to provide quality, affordable housing to great people looking for a place they can be proud to call home. <br /> <br />You may have noticed the address of the apartment, it is located on 118 Ave. I bet you are wondering is this a safe neighbourhood? You will be happy to know that the Avenue is in transition and has been for quite some time. Perhaps it has been a while since you were in the area. In fact the revitalization of 118 Ave is celebrating its tenth year. During this time the city has transformed this historic area, improving both its social and physical aspects. The City and the community are working together to improve streets, businesses, and green spaces to foster a vibrant community life. One of the main objectives has been to make the area a safe community in which to live and to attract people from outside of the area to come work, shop, and dine. The development of 118th as an Arts hub also continues. <br /> <br />You will enjoy living in close proximity to Edmonton’s gorgeous River Valley, and vibrant downtown with easy access to the south side at a fraction of the cost of an expensive downtown apartment. <br /> <br />If this sounds like a place you’d like to live please read on to find out more about the Garden Apartment we have available July 1st. <br /> <br />Features: <br /> <br />- Spacious layout <br />- Two private entrances <br />- In suite laundry - full sized washer/dryer <br />- Large storage locker (4'x 7’) <br />- Energized parking included - two spots <br />- Landscaped common yard - all maintenance is taken care of for you <br />- Updated bathroom <br />- Large, bright windows <br />- New vinyl flooring throughout (no carpet) <br />- Quiet building <br /> <br />Important Details: <br /> <br />- Available July 1st (an early move in can be arranged) <br />- Rent is $1095 per month <br />- Damage deposit is only $600 with approved credit rating otherwise it is one month's rent <br />- Heat and water are included (pay your own electricity approx. $40 per month) <br />- Cats are permitted - pet fee is $25 per month per cat <br />- A small dog (20 pounds or less) is allowed - pet fee is $50 per month (sorry absolutely no large dogs or puppies permitted) <br />- Lease required <br /> <br />Call Carlos at Crescendo Properties to book a viewing at #780-809-0836 <b

item.description: Address: 160 Cherry Street, Kitchener, ON, Canada, N2G 2C8 <p>Kitchener - Be proud of where you live...</p><p>Spectacular Renovations!</p><p>We have been extensively renovating our apartment units as they become vacant using condo quality products.</p>New Kitchens and bathrooms Recently painted hallways with updated colours Richly coloured laminate flooring or beautifully restored hardwood floors that gleam Mollucks' make our garbage area neat and tidy Bathrooms have been gutted and replaced with new tubs, toilets, vanity and flooring.<p>Rent includes Heat, water and one parking spot if needed.  Hydro is extra.</p><p>call 519-576-2751 or email us at willowburg@gmail.com</p>All our units have HUGE new windows that allows lots of light in. Ceramic tiles from kitchen to bathroom in many units Warm laminate floors or restored hardwood flooring The stairwells have floor to ceiling windows. Beautifully renovated laundry rooms on each floor. We offer you a choice of front load washers or top load washers. Large side yard with mature trees, where you are welcome to enjoy the wonderful outdoors.  New exterior lights installed that illuminate the exterior well in the evenings NEW recently installed a play structure for younger children. Secure front door entry system with pass-card type entry for tenants at all our doors - no keys to struggle with For those with bicycles we are next to the Iron Horse Trail which links you to both ends of Kitchener Responsive on-site manager Owners who care and want to create a place for you to call HOME!<br />Building Features<br />Laundry on-site Keyless entry system Well maintained building and grounds Mature trees in side yard for relaxing under Secure entry system Close to Victoria Park Steps to the Iron horse trail New play structure for small children<br />Location Details<br /><p>Victoria and Park area</p><p>Steps to Iron horse trail where you can get by bicycle anywhere in Kitchener and waterloo</p><p>School are walking distance.</p><p>Steps to walk-in clinic</p><p>Pharmacy school is nearby</p><p>Google and tech hub neighbourhood </p><br />Suite Details<br /><p>Most suites will have</p>Large wall to wall windows New or updated kitchens New toilets and tubs ceramic tiles in kitchen and bathroom Flooring is either laminate or refinished hardwood floors Steps to a laundry room Storage lockers on the same floor (extra cost)<br />Utilities Included:<br />HeatWater

item.title: Executive Style townhouse Condo
item.address: 4701 Child Avenue, Regina, SK, Canada, S4X 4N9
item.description: Address: 4701 Child Avenue, Regina, SK, Canada, S4X 4N9 Feel right at home in this 2 storey townhouse style condo. Quality built by Northridge Developments in 2009, this 1328 sq ft Energy Star Certified unit has a lot to offer. <br /> <br />Numerous upgrades include: large windows throughout, hardwood flooring in main floor living area and tile in the entrance and washrooms, frosted glass french doors, and dark stained maple cabinetry. All 3 floors have built-in wiring for wall mounted flat screen tv's. <br /> <br />The main floor features a large foyer, very bright open concept living area and 1/2 bath, Hunter Douglas screen shades and upgraded light fixtures. <br /> <br />The kitchen has ample cupboard space, pantry, crown molding on cabinets, beautiful bronze metallic back splash, under/over accent lighting with puck lights, large prep island with 2 deep soft closing (natural maple interiors) pan drawers, and granite countertops in kitchen and all washrooms. <br /> <br />Upgraded stainless steel appliances are included: built in stove with ceramic cooktop, over the range microwave/fan, french door fridge with filtered water, dishwasher. <br /> <br />A wide staircase leads up to a spacious master bedroom highlighted by a large custom built walk-in closet with natural lighting, a main bathroom, two more generous sized bright bedrooms with lots of closet space and Hunter Douglas room darkening window treatments. <br /> <br />The professionally developed basement has a good sized family room with plush carpet, well-lit laundry area (includes front loading washer and dryer on pedestals for easy access), bathroom, mechanical and storage room. Bathroom and laundry room each have upgrades of thermostatically controlled in-floor heating. <br /> <br />Other features include an oversized 14' x 22' single attached garage with remote control, professionally applied Barrier coating on floor (also on backyard patio), central vac, air exchange, and central air conditioning. <br /> <br />Relax and enjoy many evenings on your patio in a fully fenced maintenance free backyard. No backyard neighbours make this a very private space. Includes gas line for bbq. <br /> <br />This home is in a terrific location in Lakeridge within walking distance of parks, groceries/shopping, restaurants, public transportation, high schools, elementary busing plus many more amenities. <br /> <br />Residents of this development appreciate the quiet, well managed complex with low condo fees of $162.00/month. <br /> <br />This condo is sure to impress!

item.description: Address: 21 Carlton Street, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5B 1L3 I am renting out my 1bedroom+den apartment in the Met Condos for July 1, located at Carlton and Yonge. Ive been here for a year and don't have any complaints about the building, but am moving to the west end for a change! If you want to be close to the subway, Ryerson and U of T this is fantastic for you. <br /> <br />$1570 per month, utilities you will pay are electricity (approx 40 per month if you're savvy) and internet. The building has a 24 hour concierge, gym, sauna, indoor pool, terrace with bbq's, and the building is across the street from the new Loblaws in Maple leaf gardens and bulk barn. <br /> <br />The den can be used as a second bedroom which is what we are doing right now, but keep in mind it doesn't have a door and the closet for this person will be your front hall closet. Definitely a good option if you're looking for a central location and need to save some money. We currently have a queen mattress in the den and it fits with room for a dresser. Preferebly one person for this unit, but can go to two people upon discussion with the landlord. <br /> <br />The landlord is very friendly and laid back, he's there when you need him but won't bother you either! Please contact me ASAP if you're interested. =)

item.title: Yaletown Furnished 1 bd 1 bath condo - available Sept 1st
item.address: 1088 Richards Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6B 3E1
item.description: Address: 1088 Richards Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6B 3E1 This spectacular one bedroom one bath condo unit is located in the heart of Yaletown. It is close to amenities such as the yaletown-roundhouse canada line stop, sushi and thai restaurants, a dog park, yaletown seawall, Roundhouse Community Center, soccer park, library, and various coffee shops. This is a perfect place for a Masters student, a working professional, a young couple, or someone who is moving to Vancouver and needs to rent a furnished place. This is a central location for public transportation commuters to hop on the Canada Line to connect to bus routes at Olympic Village, King Edward, and Oakridge Centre. <br /> <br />The Richards Living is a modern condo development built by Aquilini Developments. The building is 4 years old with modern interior look and a brownstone exterior mixed with green landscaping. It truly has a natural Westcoast feel. The condo is fully furnished with a classic modern look and it has been acclaimed by Vancouver Magazine as one of the best places to stay. All the previous tenants were thrilled as it met their expectations for quality and comfort. <br /> <br />The condo is furnished with a queen size bed, dining table, double wardrobe storage unit, wooden hangers, leather couch, Samsung smart tv, LED lighting, and coffee table. In-suite washer and dryer in bathroom. A storage room is available to store suitcases and items. Additional wardrobe cabinet with wooden hangers and shoe pull out for extra shoes and clothing storage. The modern kitchen has fridge, stove and oven, dishwasher, auto-shut drawers, and European modern flat cabinets. <br /> <br />Daily basics such as plates, glasses, towels, ironing board, iron, microwave, toaster, cutting board, and laundry basket are included in the rent. The kitchen comes fully stocked with essentials if you plan to cook and stay in. Intercom is used for food deliveries. <br /> <br />The building includes a gym (open: 6am to 11pm daily), a garden terrace or reading area, a car wash bay, recycling and garbage room, bike storage rooms, and rear pick up area. A private or personalized display can be set up on the front and rear entrance intercoms of the building for local mobiles (604 or 778). <br /> <br />Rent of $1850 does not include cable, phone, and utilities. Tenant needs to set this up under their own account. Owner covers hot water use in the unit. Parking is additional and available as a single stall in a secured underground parkade. <br /> <br />If you are interested in making an appointment to view the suite, please email Sophia at sophia.fu2@gmail.com. It is available for move-in on Sept 1st for a one year lease. A minimum one year lease is required.

Profitez du confort d'un immeuble de très haute qualité de construction, avec air climatisé, échangeur d'air, etc. <br />Points forts de l'appt : <br />- Insonorisation supérieure - fenêtres architecturales avec vitrage spécial - aluminium extérieur haut de gamme, solide, durable et moderne. <br />- Dispositif de climatisation, système d'alarme et de protection contre les incendies, couvre-fenêtres, luminaires et appareils d'éclairage encastrés. <br />- Cuisine spacieuse et très moderne, avec hotte aspirante, Armoires en thermoplastique avec comptoir de granit. <br />- Très grande salle de bain avec céramique douche <br />- presque 9 pieds de plafond <br />- plancher de qualité : planchers de céramique (12 X 24) en entrée, cuisine, salle de douche et de bain <br /> <br />Autres avantages du Condo : <br />- Condo de 3/12, d’une superficie de 762 pieds carrés <br />- 1 grande chambre fermée qui donne sur la salle de bain <br />- 1 salon et une salle à manger spacieuse à aire ouverte avec planchers de bois franc. <br />- De nombreux espaces de rangement <br />- 2 petits balcons <br />- une terrasse commune sur le toit avec vue imprenable sur le parc Lafontaine et vue magnifique sur le Pont Champlain – emplacement exceptionnel pour les feux d’artifice en été <br />- tous les électroménagers inclus (frigo, four, lave-vaisselle, laveuse et sécheuse, micro-onde). <br /> <br />Pour tout renseignement complémentaire ou demande de visite, contacter sans tarder le 514 970-7350.

item.description: Address: Montreal, QC, Canada, H2R 1N6 Le 558 rue Dufour se libère le 12 juin! <br /> <br />Il s'agit d'un petit 4 1/2 au rez-de-chaussé d’un triplex de 1920, avec entrée indépendante. Ce logement donne accès à une petite cours aménagée en terrasse où se trouvent B.B.Q., meubles de patio et cabanon de rangement. La location inclut les meubles, électroménagers (cuisinière, frigo, laveuse et sécheuse), literie, vaisselles ainsi que les différents accessoires essentiels. La disposition des lieux favorise la location d’un couple ou d’une personne seule : cuisine, salon (avec sofa-lit, pour dépanner…), chambre et bureau. Notez que l’électricité ou l’internet ne sont toutefois pas inclus dans le prix. <br /> <br />Il est situé dans le quartier Villeray, à 5 minutes à pied de la station de métro Jean-talon (lignes orange et bleue - vers l'UQAM ou l'Université de Montréal) et à 9 minutes du Marché Jean-Talon. En fait, vous trouverez tous les types de services à proximité (épiceries, restaurants, club vidéo, quincaillerie, piscine, bibliothèque ou autres) : <br />http://www.walkscore.com/score/558-rue-dufour-montreal <br /> <br />Nous cherchons des locataire tranquiles, non-fumeurs et sans animaux pour une location de minimum 1 an à compter du 12 juin ou légèrement après. <br /> <br />Au plaisir de vous rencontrer pour une visite, <br /> <br />Alain & Karine

item.description: Address: 80 Roslyn Road, Winnipeg, MB, Canada, R3L 0G6 Unique Floor Plan Only Found In The Rossmore <br />Osborne Village / Fort Rouge <br /> <br />80 Roslyn Rd <br />contact building manager 204-960-0343 <br />or email at kornil1987@gmail.com <br /> <br /> <br />Listed on Winnipeg's historic building registry, the Rossmore offers heritage bachelor 1 and 2 bedroom suites. Each suite in the Rossmore was designed with its own unique characteristics. These spacious suites offer hardwood floors uniquely designed utilizing different woods to give each suite its personal touch. With extra high ceilings, original electric fireplaces, and wainscoting the personality flows. Bathrooms have been retrofitted with period appropriate taps, marble tub surrounds, and heritage styled toilets, to give you the latest in features without losing the suites architectural integrity. <br /> <br />Best of all, this building is located in the heart of Osborne Village. Steps away from Winnipeg's most vibrant neighborhood, you have access to the best of Winnipeg's eclectic community. The basics like Safeway, Shoppers drugmart and Shell are just steps away, yet all the adventure of famous restaurants, lounges and boutique shops are just around the corner. <br /> <br />Located near an excellent bus route and the new Rapid transit system, getting around is a breeze. <br /> <br /> <br />Included in rent: Heat and Water <br /> <br />1 bedrooms <br /> <br />Amenities <br /> <br />o Coin-op Laundry <br />o Heritage Style <br />o Ornamental fireplaces <br />o Eat in kitchen <br />o Hardwood floors <br />o Period inspired lighting <br />o Currently transitioning to a non-smoking building <br />o Cat friendly, sorry dogs are not permitted

item.address: Calgary, AB, Canada, T2P 0W3
item.description: Address: Calgary, AB, Canada, T2P 0W3 <p>In the heart of down-town Calgary, Waterfront is the newest exclusive condo building located in the elite Eau Claire neighbourhood.  This upscale 1 bedroom 1 bathroom unit comes complete with a gourmet kitchen, stackable in-suite washer & dryer, climate control heating/air conditioning, dishwasher, microwave, balcony and is pre-wired for cable and high-speed Internet access. There are rich mahogany hardwood floors and cabinetry and floor to ceiling windows which allow the sun to pour in throughout the day. Rent includes all utilities, basic cable TV, WiFi and one underground secure parking stall .</p><p> </p><p>Amenities at Waterfront include a concierge, 24 hour security, a fitness center and spa (yoga studio, whirlpool and steam room), games/lounge room, open-air terrace, a rooftop urban garden oasis, private 16-seat theatre room and same floor storage facilities. </p><p> </p><p>There is a broad range of shopping and dining opportunities in the immediate vicinity and it is within walking access to some of the city's most sought-after spots. The site also offers easy access to the +15 network system, proximity to the eclectic Chinatown and seconds to Calgary's extensive network of multi-user pathway system.</p><p> </p><p>* RATES BASED ON A MINIMUM 3 MONTH TERM *</p><p> </p><p>AVAILABLE JULY 1</p><p></p><p>PLEASE CONTACT MARCEL @ (403)404-0206 OR SUSAN @ (403)540-8244 TO BOOK A VIEWING </p>

item.title: LUXURY – Gorgeous 34th Floor Penthouse With Stunning Views
item.address: 210 15 Avenue SE, Calgary, AB, Canada, T2G 0B5
item.description: Address: 210 15 Avenue SE, Calgary, AB, Canada, T2G 0B5 This Prestigious 34th floor Penthouse is the ideal home for the person or couple who deserves it all. Who wants to be, do and have the Extra in Extra Ordinary. Who believes that you only live once and who wants to make it the absolute best it can be. Who wants to create an experience that very few have the opportunity to do - to live in a PENTHOUSE! <br /> <br />The OUTSTANDING RIVER, MOUNTAIN AND CITY VIEWS from every room and window in this Penthouse are spectacular... You Decide How You Start And End The Day. <br /> <br />Admire the majestic Rocky Mountains to the south west, the calming Elbow River to the south, the world famous Stampede Park to the east and the ever changing downtown skyline which serves as your background to the north. Stunning sunrises and sunsets from this executive perch are simply divine. An added benefit is the bird’s eye view you have of the celebrated Calgary Stampede annual fireworks display in July. <br /> <br />This two-storey, 2100 sq. ft., south west corner PENTHOUSE is the best positioned condo in one of Calgary’s urban residential towers called Vetro, located in the heart of downtown Calgary. <br /> <br />The modern design and open floor plan of this exclusive air-conditioned suite provides a level of comfort, luxury living and entertainment space that is rarely available in any rental suite. <br /> <br />Porcelain tile and mirrored closet doors set off the front entry foyer which then flows into the uniquely designed open kitchen. Granite countertops, an extended breakfast bar, dark chocolate full height flat panel kitchen cabinets, premium fixtures and designer backsplash unite to produce a modern open kitchen ideal for cooking the most extravagant of meals, having a beautifully catered event or simply entertaining family and friends. <br /> <br />The Stainless Steel appliance package includes a 23 cubic foot side-by-side refrigerator to easily accommodate the most discerning of ‘foodies’, with water and ice maker for your convenience. Also included is a ceran top self-cleaning convection oven, a 5 cycle ultra-quiet dishwasher and an OTR microwave, everything you need to make life that much easier. <br /> <br />This well-designed kitchen opens to both the living room and dining room and is surrounded by an impressive expanse of 9 ft. floor to ceiling windows – wrap yourself in the never ending stream of natural light while you ground yourself in the breath taking views...a level of relaxation that is hard to find this day and age. <br /> <br />Stay indoors and enjoy this impeccable sanctuary as much as you like...but I can promise you’ll fall in love with your private, oversized south west facing (RockyMountainview) 200+ sq

item.title: Spadina and St. Clair: 400 Walmer Road, 2BR
item.address: Toronto, ON, Canada, M5P 2X7
item.description: Address: Toronto, ON, Canada, M5P 2X7 Apartment for Rent in Toronto<br/><br/>Key Property Details<br/>Luxury Rental Apartments in a Fantastic Location!Fitness Facilities, Sauna, & Indoor Pool!Relax in elegant living spaces, including guest suites!<br/>Property Features<br/>Air ConditioningBalconyCable ReadyConciergeElevatorFitness CenterOn Site ManagementParty Room PetsPoolSauna<br/>Detailed Property Information<br/>Nestled in the heart of affluent Forest Hill in Toronto, your home at 400 Walmer Road has everything you could ask for in a luxury rental apartment – a fantastic location, beautiful landscaping and impeccable service. <br> <br> 400 Walmer Road is surrounded by all of the comforts and conveniences you’d expect when living at a premier address. Unwind in our lush, serene grounds complete with water fountains or catch up with family and friends on the terrace by the pool. You are also steps from the TTC and Forest Hill Village with its quaint cafés, restaurants and gourmet shopping. It’s everything you need to make living easy at one of the top rental apartment buildings in Toronto, and it’s all yours to discover at 400 Walmer Road. <br> <br> Our premier suites for rent boast the finest finishes such as beautiful hardwood floors, newly remodeled kitchens and bathrooms, climate control with air conditioning and private balconies to enjoy beautiful views of the city. We also offer guest suites for those times your friends or family come to visit. <br> <br> Indulge in our collection of amenities offering you convenience and comfort. From the time you come home to 400 Walmer Road, our Concierge is there to greet you and our on site team are there to ensure they make living easy for you. <br> <br> Relax and unwind in our fitness facilities, sauna and indoor pool with skylights. Or finish off that novel in the comfort of our newly renovated library/social room. There is also a terrace by the pool, where you can catch up with friends and family or enjoy a barbeque dinner on a nice summer evening. Recreational programs are available as well for our residents including aqua fit, pilates and yoga. <br> <br> Need to host a party or prepare for that big night out? We have the perfect room to host your event, so go ahead and invite your guests. If you need to get that dress or tuxedo dry cleaned or get your hair done to prepare, we have an on-site dry cleaner and hair salon, so you can look your best. And if you run out of soft drinks, our on-site convenience store has what you need. <br><br> <br/><br/><br/>Additional Property Information<br/>SurveillanceDoorman/Concierge DeskSpacious suites with beautiful hardwood floorsEnjoy remodeled kitchens and bathroomsRelax in elegant living spaces, including guest suitesTake in the view from private balconiesL

item.title: Montgomery Mills - 24 Mabelle Ave. - 3 Bedroom Apartment for...
item.address: Toronto, ON, Canada, M9A 4X8
item.description: Address: Toronto, ON, Canada, M9A 4X8 <p><br />These Condo style suites at 24 Mabelle Ave. are conveniently located on the Bloor subway line only a few minutes walk from the Islington subway station. This is a great neighbourhood with lots to offer residents. It's close to the Islington Village shopping district which has a great choice of shops and restaurants. There are also elementary, mid and high schools in the neighbourhood. There are many parks in the area including Mimico Creek Park with exceptional recreational facilities. This area of Islingon has a mixture of single family homes and more recently many apartment, condo and commercial towers on Bloor St. The Bloor / Islington area is perfect if you enjoy an active lifestyle and only 20 minutes from downtown Toronto on the subway.</p><p> This is a very clean, bright and welcoming building. Each suite is freshly painted with newly finished hardwood floors throughout and air conditioning. This building has superior facilities, such as a gym, indoor pool, sauna, party room and games room. It also has controlled access, underground parking, and laundry facilities. Conveniently located in the building is a dry cleaners and beauty salon. The grocery store is just across the street from this building. So whether you drive or not most amenities are within walking distance including a pharmacy and many shops and restaurants. <br /> </p><p><br /> </p><br />Location Details<br /><p>This area which is considered Islington Village dates back to the 1800's. Thomas Montgomery's Inn was a major stagecoach stop in the early 1800's and this community was named Islington after the hometown of his wife in England. The Montgomery Inn is now a Museum and open to the public to enjoy afternoon tea and it also hosts many other functions.</p><p><br /> </p><p><br /> </p><br />Utilities Included:<br />HeatWaterElectricity

item.address: 4502 Avenue Bourbonnière, Montreal, QC, Canada, H1X 2M5
item.description: Address: 4502 Avenue Bourbonnière, Montreal, QC, Canada, H1X 2M5 Voici un 4 1/2 idéale pour un couple, colocataire ou personne seule. L'appartement est situé au premier étage d'un immeuble à trois étages. Il y a un balcon avant et arrière avec rangement en arrière. Accès à la cours pour tous les locataires. L'appartement possède deux chambres fermées avec garde-robe de même dimension pour les deux chamrbres. Un salon avec acès au balcon, une cuisine avec entrée laveuse et sécheuse dans le couloir en face de la cuisine. Beaucoup de rangement. L'appartement demande que de bon lcoataires et un peu d'amour. Possibilité de fournir de la peinture. Cartier tranquille pas trop loin du jardin Botanique, parc Maissonneuve et transport en commun. Shop Angus avec tous les services pas très loin également. Pour une visite, vous devez communiquer avec moi par mail en tout temps en laissant votre nom et téléphone pour que je puisse vous joindre à mon tour. Je dois prendre rendez-vous 24h00 en avance pour faire visiter. Les visites sont en semaine de préférence entre 9h00 et 18h30.

item.title: New Suites, picturesque views, great lifestyle and value
item.address: 2160 Paliswood Road SW, Calgary, AB, Canada, T2V 4S5
item.description: Address: 2160 Paliswood Road SW, Calgary, AB, Canada, T2V 4S5 <p>New 1 and 2 bedroom suites with modern features combine with the serenity of the Glenmore Park Reservoir and Heritage Park community to promote a lifestyle alternative to downtown living.   Elata at Glenmore Gardens is the good life, on your terms.</p><p> </p><p>Key Property Details – Settle for everything…</p>New Suites with Modern Features!In-suite laundry and air conditioning!Elata is a Non-Smoking BuildingOpen- Air BalconiesFitness CenterParking ($125)Party/Social RoomPet FriendlyIndoor Pool<p> </p><p> </p><p>Vertica Resident Services Elata is a new rental residence located in one of the most tranquil and picturesque areas in Calgary, along the Glenmore Reservoir. Conveniently located in Southwest Calgary at 2160 Palliser Drive SW, near the intersections of 19th Street SW, and 90th Avenue SW.<br /> <br /> Suites are now available for rent in this relaxed setting with units overlooking the water. Live within a stone's throw of the water and enjoy the meandering pathways surrounded by nature. <br /> <br /> Elata at Glenmore Gardens offers resort-style living in the city. Enjoy the heated indoor pool, the fitness centre and lush ten-acre gardens within steps of outdoor activities. Venture out for a walk or hike along the water with friends or a leisurely bike ride on the endless paved pathways and trails. <br /> <br /> Summertime offers opportunities to sail, kayak, boat, and canoe. Wintertime is its own wonderland with cross-country skiing, snowshoeing and a great excuse to warm your hands with a hot mug at one of the local coffee shops. Or just stick close to home and get to know your neighbours. </p><p> </p><p>Call us at 403-279-0696    Or visit us at vertica.ca</p><p> </p><p>Experience the Vertica Difference</p>Customer Service, Cleanliness, Convenience and Community… it’s our Commitment.

item.title: Delair Court Apartments - 1 Bedroom plus Den Apartment for Rent
item.address: 35180 DeLair Road, Abbotsford, BC, Canada, V3G 3B4
item.description: Address: 35180 DeLair Road, Abbotsford, BC, Canada, V3G 3B4 <p>Delair Court Apartments for rent in Abbotsford provides luxurious apartment living in a friendly and comfortable environment. Our one and two bedroom apartments feature the same tasteful furnishings that can be found in upscale condominiums, including berber carpeting, laminate flooring, quality kitchen cabinets and finishings. Convenience is on your side with in-suite laundry and full size refrigerators, dishwashers and stoves in every suite. Feel safe and secure with underground parking, and enjoy your own in-suite storage as well as your own balcony. Our apartments at Delair Court Apartments are awaiting your arrival.</p><p>Delair Court Apartments is located on Delair Road just east of the Sumas Way interchange with easy access to the Trans-Canada Highway. Those who love the outdoors will enjoy Delair Park, just a short walk away. Church goers will also enjoy a variety of different places of worship also within walking distance. Shopping is made easy with many great shopping outlets only a few minutes away by car. Home Depot, Wal-Mart, Costco, Starbucks, Tim Hortons, Save-On Foods and much more are all located on Sumas Way. Our beautiful suites at Delair Court Apartments are awaiting your arrival.</p><br />Building Features<br />A newer apartment building in Abbotsford 1 and 2 bedroom apartments with the same features and quality finishings seen in expensive condominium buildings Each building has secured underground parking with a gate  Parking included with additional parking at $25 per month Preferred lease term is one year No dogs or reptiles Cat friendly<br />Location Details<br />Delair Court is located on Delair Road just east of the Sumas Way interchange with easy access to the Trans-Canada Highway Delair Park is within short walking distance as well as a number of local churches Only a few minutes drive to great shopping outlets including Home Depot, Wal-Mart, Costco, Starbucks, Tim Hortons, Save-on Foods and many others on Sumas Way<br />Suite Details<br />Nicely decorated and spacious with laminate flooring in the kitchen and entrance areas, berber carpets, quality kitchen cabinets and finishing throughout Full size fridge, stove and dishwasher, in-suite washer and dryer Window coverings, insuite storage rooms and balconies in all suites All 2 bedroom suites have 2 full bathrooms The larger 1 bedroom suites have a den, perfect for a home office The larger 2 bedroom corner suites have a gas fireplace<br />Utilities Included:<br />Water
